blogs.title: You’ve Come Along Way Baby? Gender Stereotypes in Children’s Picture Books
blogs.summary:
I’ve been doing a shifting project in the curriculum/children’s lit collection I manage at my academic library.
Every now and then I come across a little “gem” like this: I’m Glad I’m a Boy! I’m Glad I’m a Gi

author.name: Mr. Library Dude
author.description: I'm a librarian. I'm a dude. Mr. Library Dude. Blogging about libraries, technology & teaching.
